name: Graveyard Mage: Ogres' Assault Demo
description:
In "Graveyard Mage: Ogres' Assault," players take on the role of a powerful mage who is tasked with defending a graveyard from a horde of ogres that have invaded. Armed with a magical staff, the player must cast spells and use their wits to fend off the invaders and protect the graveyard. As the game progresses, the player will face increasingly difficult waves of ogres, each with their own strengths and weaknesses. The graveyard itself will also provide obstacles and opportunities for the player, as they navigate through the maze of tombstones and crypts. Will the Graveyard Mage be able to hold off the ogre assault and save the graveyard from destruction? Only time will tell in this exciting and action-packed game.

Keys are:

Arrows to move and TAB to shoot

ENTER to begin game.
